version_description:
We have fixed the issue where the app could crash when trying to edit parts of clothing in the 2D editor.

Thank you for everyone's patience while we worked through this issue!

We have fixed the issue where the app could crash when trying to edit parts of clothing in the 2D editor.

Thank you for everyone's patience while we worked through this issue!

This is a major update to support all of Apple's latest devices!
- Many stability issues and bugs have been resolved!
- Skins can now be directly applied to your character through your Mojang account.
- Also includes several cosmetic changes such

- Many stability issues and bugs have been resolved!
- Skins can now be directly applied to your character through your Mojang account.
- Also includes several cosmetic changes such

By popular request, you can now get skins from Planet Minecraft!
More features coming down the pipe!
And as always, if you like the update, please take a moment to rate the app! Thank you for your support!
